report.title: Map for parent/child sample
report.description: Geometry data summarising a parent/child sample.
report.query: select case when s.parent_sample_id IS NOT NULL THEN 'child' ELSE 'parent' END as type, s.id, st_astext(l.boundary_geom) as geom from cache_samples_functional s /* inner join, as only need location boundary geoms, samples are embedded in occurrences below. */ join locations l on l.id=s.location_id and l.deleted=false where (s.id=#sample_id# OR s.parent_sample_id=#sample_id#) and s.website_id in (#website_ids#) union select 'occurrence', o.id, CASE WHEN (#allow_sensitive_full_precision# = 0 AND #includes_sensitive# = 1) OR (#allow_unreleased# = 0 AND o.release_status != 'R') THEN '' ELSE st_astext(o.public_geom) END as geom from cache_occurrences_functional o where (o.parent_sample_id=#sample_id# or o.sample_id=#sample_id#) and o.website_id in (#website_ids#)

param.name: sample_id
param.description: ID of the sample to load

param.name: allow_sensitive_full_precision
param.description: Allow full precision even if sample includes a sensitive occurrence

param.name: includes_sensitive
param.description: Does sample include a sensitive occurrence
